original_title: Sri Lanka’s key inflation rate accelerates in November
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The inflation rate measured for November is 3.4%, said the Department of Census and Statistics on Thursday (30). This is an increase from 1.5% recorded in October 2023.
